title: The Shiver Stone
description: Dive into adventure...Carys has a lot to do: a mystery to solve, a new friend to help, a small dog to look after and her father's girlfriend to ignore.Helping Jago find his father will mean Carys risking everything, on the Pembrokeshire coast in the shadow of the Shiver Stone.'Heart-in-the-mouth adventure' Sue Purkiss'A mysterious, lyrical adventure with a dark secret at its heart' Steven Voake'Beautifully crafted ... perfectly balances family drama with mystery' Elen Caldecott
author: Sharon Tregenza
